alert.note: Alert for Custer (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 19 at 12:21PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River below Mackay Reservoir affecting Custer County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is possible. * WHERE...Big Lost River below Mackay Reservoir. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.3 feet, Lowland flooding below Mackay Dam through the Darlington Flats. US Highway 93 may be impacted at the curve by Leslie between 3900 North and 4050 North. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM MDT Monday the stage was 4.0 feet. - Forecast...A rise to around 4.3 feet will be possible over the next few days. - Flood stage is 4.3 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.2 feet on 06/17/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Big Lost River Mackay Reservoi 4.3 4.0 Mon 11 am MD 3.9 3.9 3.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
